name: Stella's Salty Steal
description: Welcome to Stella's Salty Steal! A game where you play as Stella a sea star who was once a famous pirate. She was attacked by her own crew who took her life. Now she's come back to become the richest sea star in all of America. Use WSAD to collect gems in bubble and try to grasp a high score., although watch out for lasers. There are so far 3 different ending. Depending on your score you could see them all.
